definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: (tread), wash (NH id.; Ph. [[כבס]] as pt.; As. kabâsu, tread (down), subjugate, kibšu, step, path, Dl:HWB)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. only [[מְסִלַּת שְׂדֵה כוֹבֵס]] highway of fuller's (= treader's, washer's) field Is 7:3, Is 36:2 = 2Ki 18:17.

wash garments (i.e. by treading) Ex 19:10, Ex 19:14 (E), 2Sa 19:25; fig. of Judah Ge 49:11; elsewhere chiefly P: Le 6:20, Le 11:25, Le 11:28, Le 13:6, Le 13:34, Le 15:11, Nu 8:9 +; ‖[[רָחץ]] (which = wash person) Le 14:8, Le 14:9, Le 15:5, Le 15:6, Le 15:7, Le 15:8, Le 15:10, Le 15:11 + (´[[כ]] in Le 27 t., ‖´[[ר]] 15 t.; in Nu 8 t., ‖´[[ר]] 3 t.); Pt. = fuller (cf. Qal), only ´[[בּׂרִית מְכ]] Mal 3:2. †
wash person, only poet. and fig. [[אִם תְּכַבְּסִי בַּנֶּתֶר]] Je 2:22; [[כַּבְּסִי מֵרָעָה לִבֵח]] Je 4:14; c. sf. Ps 51:4 (‖[[טהר]]; + [[מֵעָוֹן]]); v:Ps 51:9 (‖[[חִטֵּא]]). †

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pf. [[וְכֻבַּס]] consec. Le 13:58, Le 15:17 be washed, of garment. †

definitions.title: Hothp.
definitions.body: (Ges:§ 54, 3) Inf. [[אַחֲרֵי הֻכַּבֵּס]] [[אֶת־הַנֶּגַע]] Le 13:55 after the plague is washed out, so v:Le 13:56.
